value: title: R Weekly 2019-14 Shiny Contest, usethis for reporting
description: Weekly News in the R Community.

+ Make macro ‚ÄòF77_VISIBILITY‚Äô have been removed and replaced by ‚ÄòF_VISIBILITY‚Äô.

+ Make macros ‚ÄòF77‚Äô, ‚ÄòFCPIFCPLAGS‚Äô and ‚ÄòSHLIB_OPENMP_FCFLAGS‚Äô have been removed and replaced by ‚ÄòFC‚Äô, ‚ÄòFPICFLAGS‚Äô and ‚ÄòSHLIB_OPENMP_FFLAGS‚Äô respectively. [‚ÄòF77‚Äô has been reverted until Apr 15.]
+ ‚Äòas.matrix.data.frame()‚Äô now produces better strings from logicals, thanks to [PR#17548](https://bugs.r-project.org/bugzilla3/show_bug.cgi?id=17548) from Gabe Becker.
+ ‚ÄòR CMD build‚Äô now removes ‚Äòsrc/*.mod‚Äô files on all platforms.
+ ‚ÄòR_unif_index‚Äô is now considered to be part of the C API.
+ [This week's local R-User and applied stats events](https://community.rstudio.com/c/irl)
More past events at [R conferences & meetups](https://conf.rweekly.org).
Your support will keep R Weekly team moving! üí°
